name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ESUIT | Friends Request Bot for Facebookâ„¢

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send bulk friend requests, filter users, customize request intervals, statistics, and cancel requests in bulk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Boost your social network on Facebook with our cutting-edge browser extension, designed to efficiently send bulk friend requests. Our user-friendly tool offers advanced filtering capabilities with rich friend fields, enabling you to target the ideal user profiles. Enjoy the convenience of a customizable request interval that ensures stability and avoid the risk of overwhelming prospective friends or triggering Facebook's security alerts.

1. Bulk Friend Requests: Expand your network swiftly by sending out multiple friend requests with just a click.
2. Advanced User Filtering: Utilize extensive friend fields to narrow down and connect with the most relevant Facebook users.
3. Customizable Request Interval: Specify the time between requests to maintain a steady flow without compromising your account's integrity.
4. Daily Request Success Tracking: Keep an eye on your social expansion with daily statistics for successful friend connections.
5. Inaccessible User Filter: Our intelligent algorithm filters out users who can't be requested, streamlining your efforts.
6. Bulk Request Cancellation: Manage your outgoing friend requests with the ability to cancel in bulk, should you need to retract them.

Enhance your online presence and foster new connections effortlessly. Get ready to transform your Facebook experience with our sophisticated social networking tool. Be sure to grab this essential Facebook friend-adding extension that brings simplicity and efficiency to your digital social life!

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Find more extensions: This is a promotional link if you want to discover more browser extensions developed by ESUIT.
Buy me a coffee: If you'd like to support our future updates and maintenance, you can use this feature to buy us a cup of coffee.
Report a bug: If you encounter any issues, you can get in touch with us through this link, and we will assist you in fixing it.
Rate Chrome Store options: If you enjoy using this extension, you can click here to rate it.

Boost your social network on Facebook with our cutting-edge browser extension, designed to efficiently send bulk friend requests. Our user-friendly tool offers advanced filtering capabilities with rich friend fields, enabling you to target the ideal user profiles. Enjoy the convenience of a customizable request interval that ensures stability and avoid the risk of overwhelming prospective friends or triggering Facebook's security alerts.

Enhance your online presence and foster new connections effortlessly. Get ready to transform your Facebook experience with our sophisticated social networking tool. Be sure to grab this essential Facebook friend-adding extension that brings simplicity and efficiency to your digital social life!

Instagram Host Permission Description:
This extension uses the GraphQL API to retrieve data for each input user ID, such as name, profile picture, and profile link. To ensure the proper functioning of the GraphQL API, this extension requires permission from https://instagram.com to authorize the operations of GraphQL interface requests.

If you need to subscribe to our service, we will collect your email address to verify your subscription status. (We only collect this data from subscribers; if you do not subscribe, we will not collect any of your data.) This is our privacy policy.
https://esuit.dev/privacy-policy

Notice: this extension has In-App Purchases.
This extension includes features that require payment to unlock unlimited usage. Please refer to our pricing page for more details.
https://esuit.dev/pricing/friends-request-bot-for-facebook
